fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may choose to Hex a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Hexes are permanent.
- When all living non-Coven members are Hexed, all Hexed players are dealt a passive Modkill Attack.
- With the Necronomicon, you gain Astral visits and will deal a Basic Attack to your target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.
